vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.13.9;
father of: Palti (H6406)
§ Raphu = "healed"
father of Palti, the spy from the tribe of Benjamin
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Paltí, espía; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉孚 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "被醫治"
便雅憫支派的探子帕提的父親(民 13:9)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拉孚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "被医治"
便雅悯支派的探子帕提的父亲(民 13:9)
